thread.title: Great stay in Paris
thread.title_full: Great stay in Paris - Review of Hotel Joke - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JohnHunter1980
title: Great stay in Paris
text: We loved the Hotel Joke in Paris it was perfect for our needs - perfect location with plenty of shops, restaurants and nearby transport options, friendly and helpful staff and a tasty breakfast. We loved the quirky room and funky design of the hotel. Free drinks and snacks in reception is a great touch. Arnaud and other staff members made us feel very welcome and we would definitely come back. Thank you.
